She is applying for her third loan with the aim of re-plastering the front part of her house; and if there is enough money, tiling the walk and living room. In this way she will provide better comfort for her family. 

She says she feels very grateful for the opportunity she has been given; as with the loans, she has been gradually improving her little house.

loans.use: To re-plaster her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Amera

texts.en:
Amera is a 37-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan and a mother of three children.

Amera is an owner of a home-based project. She sells blankets and clothes and is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase more quantities for trading purposes.

Amera is looking to expand her project and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and blankets to sell

loans.name: Nawal

texts.en:
Nawal is a conservative person who is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. Thus, the man in the photo is her husband.

Nawal is a 34 years old and married. She is from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan and a mother of three children.

Nawal is selling clothes and she is working from her home.

Nawal is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase more quantities of clothes to increase her sales volume and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Zurab

texts.en:
Zurab is 63 years old. He lives in a small village of West Georgia with his wife Mzia. Zurab and Mzia are retired but they earn a living through agriculture. The family has a farm with four milk cows and six sheep and they produce cheese to sell at the local market. The family also sells lambs. Along with their farm, Zurab and Mzia are busy with a family-owned greenhouse, where they grow greens and cucumbers. They sell their harvest at local markets. Their total average monthly is 900 GEL, including their monthly pensions. 

Zurab is requesting a loan to purchase a milk cow to expand their dairy farm. After this investment, the family will produce and sell twenty-five percent more cheese. This will improve their income and living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es: La socia continua trabajando con la compra y venta de joyas, perfumes, cremas y otros por catalogos, ella tambien aporvecha quee s docente y lleva  a su institucion a repartir a sus compañeras, la socia es una mujer muy trabajdora y ahora que comenzo las clases escolares la socia desea invertir en la compra de joyas, perfumes y otros productos en oferta para que ella pueda venderlos y ganar algo extra.
texts.en:
The borrower is still buying and selling jewelry, perfumes and creams by catalog. She also makes good use of the fact that she is a teacher, and takes products to her school to distribute among her co-workers. 

She is a very hard-working woman, and now that classes have started, she wishes to invest in the purchase of jewelry, perfumes, and other products that are on sale, so that she can sell them, and earn something extra.

loans.use: To buy jewelry, creams and perfumes to sell.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en: Fatuma is a married woman. She has two children and one of them is enrolled in school. Her husband works as a teacher. Fatuma operates a shop and sells her goods in a shop. She's worked in this business for two years and was previously employed selling soaps. Her primary customers are neighbors. Fatuma's other source of income includes contributions from her husband. She describes her greatest business challenge to be the high cost of products and her highest monthly expenses are food and transport. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Fatuma will use the KES 50,000 loan to expand her business and open a vegetable stall. Fatuma aspires to open a new business in Kwale town in the future. She joined Yehu because it's easy to join.

loans.use: to open a vegetable stall.

loans.name: You Nai Sim

texts.en: You Nai Sim, 38, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in animal husbandry for over two years, earning approximately USD 6 per day. Her husband runs a public transportation (Tuk Tuk) business and earns about USD 8 per day. Because their present Tuk Tuk trailer is too old, You Nai Sim is requesting a loan of USD 1,000 to purchase a new trailer for her husband to replace their old one. This purchase would enable her husband to attract more customers and generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home and help her children get a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to build a kitchen and a bathroom to provide hygienic living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a trailer for her husband

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es: Con su credikiva, Rosalba compró materias primas e insumos y elaboró bolsos y maletines sintétcos que vendió en la temporada escolar. En la actualidad está a plicando a un nuevo  credikiva,  con el que comprará cuerina, cuero gomas e insumos para fabricar nuevos articulos, su inversión será exitosa porque cuenta con el reconocimiento de su clientela y una base de clients muy buena. Ella dice a los financiadores de Kiva que      " Gracias a ellos hay muchos hogares de microemrpesas felices"
texts.en: Rosalba used her previous Kiva loan to purchase supplies and materials for making bags and briefcases that she sold during the school season.  She is now applying for a new loan, which she will use to purchase faux leather, leather, rubber, and other supplies for making more bags and briefcases.  Her investment will be successful because she has a very good customer base and is appreciated by her clientele.  Rosalba says to Kiva lenders, “There are a lot of happy small business people thanks to you.”

loans.use: to purchase faux leather, leather, rubber, and other materials for making bags and briefcases.

loans.name: Mariza

texts.es:
Mariza nació en la ciudad de Lamay y tiene 40 años de edad, ella vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas, ella se dedica a la venta de productos secos como por ejemplo maíz, cebada, trigo y otras cosas más. Mariza llevas sus productos a la ciudad de Puerto Maldonado y vende en uno de los mercados más populares de la ciudad antes mencionada. El sueño de Mariza es sacar profesional a sus hijos. 

Mariza en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más productos secos. 

Mariza pertenece al banco comunal “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” de la Asociación Arariwa de la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco, Perú. 

Mariza agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Mariza is 40, and was born in the town of Lamay. She lives in the city where she was born and where she carries on her livelihood. She sells bulk grains  such as corn, barley, wheat and other things. 

Mariza takes her products to the city of Puerto Maldonado, and sells in one of the most popular markets in the above-mentioned city. Mariza's dream is to see her children become professionals. 

On this occasion, Mariza needs the loan to buy more bulk grains. 

Mariza belongs to the “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” communal bank of Asociación Arariwa, located in Calca province, Cusco department, Peru.

Mariza appreciates and is thankful for the loan, and promises to pay her monthly installments.

loans.use: To buy more bulk grains to sell.

loans.name: Kwekwe

texts.en:
Kwekwe is a married woman who has six children, three of whom are enrolled in school. Her husband works as a businessman and Kwekwe operates a shop where she sells her goods. She has worked in this business for five years and previously was employed at another kiosk. Kwekwe's primary customers are her neighbors. Her other source of income includes her husband's earnings. Kwekwe describes her greatest business challenge to be credit sales that sometimes lead to bad debts. She owns a house that has electricity but no running water. 

Kwekwe is requesting a 35,000 KES loan to pay school fees. In the future, she aspires to have a wholesale business. Kwekwe joined Yehu because it focuses so much on its customers.

loans.use: to pay school fees

loans.name: Juan Victor

texts.es:
Juan Víctor tiene 52 años de edad, es divorciado, y sus hijos son mayores de edad y viven independientes, el reside en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes.
Don Juan la actividad que le genera ingresos es un negocio de servicio de transporte (fletes), dentro y fuera de la ciudad. Don Juan presta los servicios a cualquier persona que lo necesite. Tiene un vehículo el cual utiliza para ejercer dicha actividad y manifiesta  que le ha sido rentable. EL lleva 5 años dedicándose a este negocio ya que es su fuente de trabajo que le proporciona los ingresos necesarios para el sustento de su vida. Aparte de esta actividad también se dedica a la compra y venta artículos en mal estado (chatarra), para tener otro ingreso extra. El especifica que realiza este trabajo a cualquier hora que se le presente.
Juan esta solicitando un préstamo con ODEF de 10,000 lempiras para invertir en la reparación de su vehículo, el cual es la herramienta que utiliza para trabajar. Esta inversión es para dar un mejor servicio a los clientes manteniendo su vehículo en buen estado.
Su meta es en el futuro lograr obtener un mejor vehículo y tener una casa más cómoda.
texts.en:
Juan Víctor is 52 years old and divorced.  His children are adults and live independently.  He lives in the Choloma municipality in Cortes.

Juan’s business activity, which generates his income, is transportation service (charters) within and outside of the city.  Juan provides his services to any person who needs them.  He has a vehicle that he uses for his business, and he states that it has been profitable for him.

He has worked in this business for five years because it his source of work that provides the necessary income for him to support himself.  He also buys and sells items that are in bad condition (junk) in order to have an extra income.  He does this work whenever the opportunity arises.

Juan is requesting a loan with ODEF for 10,000 lempiras to repair his vehicle.  This is the tool he uses to work.  This investment is to give his customers better service by keeping his vehicle in good working order.

His goal for the future is to manage to get a better vehicle and to have a more comfortable house.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle (the tool he works with for trips).

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en:
Sophia is a married woman. She has four children, and all are enrolled in school. Her husband works as a clerk. Sophia operates a farm and sells her goods from home. She's worked in this business for three years and was previously employed selling vegetables. 

Her primary customers are neighbors. Sophia's other source of income includes contributions from her husband. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality, and her highest monthly expense is food. 

She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Sophia will use the 25,000 Kenyan shilling (KES) loan to purchase seeds and plowing tools. Sophia aspires to have a borehole in the future. She joined Yehu to access loan facilities.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and plowing tools.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Don Antonio tiene 61 años, el vive con su esposa y su hija, su esposa es  comerciante quien  además lo apoya en su molino, el vive en la ciudad de Choluteca. Su negocio se encuentra en un punto estratégico donde la fluidez de personas es en grandes cantidades ya que no tiene  competencia en su barrio, el crédito le ayudaría a mejorar su molino ya que con ello compraría bandas, discos, lijas, lima, aceites, gusanos para tenerlo en mejores condiciones con el financiamiento espera darle un mejor servicio a sus clientes y así de esta manera satisfacer con mas prontitud sus necesidades  y generarse buenos ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida para el y su familia.  Planes a futuro es seguir creciendo día a día en su negocio propio y comprar un molino de motor para darles  un servicio completo a sus clientes.
 
Choluteca, Honduras –  Marzo del 2012
texts.en:
Don Antonio is 61, and lives with his wife and daughter in the city of Choluteca. His wife has a small business and also helps him with his mill. 

His business is strategically located at a point where there is a large flow of pedestrians, and he has no competition in his neighborhood. 

The loan would help him to improve his mill, as he would use it to buy belts, discs, sandpapers, files, oils and augers, in order to maintain it in better condition. With the loan he hopes to give better service to his customers. In that way meet he will meet his needs more readily and generate good income, so that he can have a better quality of life for himself and his family. 

His plans for the future are to keep his business growing day by day, and to buy a motorized mill to give his customers a complete service.

loans.use: To buy disks, belts, sandpapers, files, etc. for his grinding mill.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret is 36 years old and married with two children. She runs a retail shop to earn a living and she has been in the business for three years, She describes her customers as low-income earners because they live in the slums. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to own a wholesale shop in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sugar, tea leaves and rice to sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar, tea leaves and rice to sell

loans.name: Helena

texts.es: Helena con su credikiva compró frutas tropicales de la época que vendió muy bien e hizo reparaciones a su vivienda. Ella ha continuado con todos sus negocios: venta de tuberculos y frutas, venta de mercancia y ofrece tambien servicios de arriendo de lavadoras, a las amas de casa de su barrio y otros aledaños. En la actualidad se está preparando para recibir un nuevo credikiva y con el comprará mercancias variadas solicitadas por sus clientes y tambien hará nuevas adecuaciones locativas, porque quiere mejorara mucho mas, sus condiciones habitacionales y las de su nucleo famliar. Ella envia un mensaje a sus financiadores de Kiva y pide que sigan apoyando a todos las pequeños microempresas, para surgir y seguir adelante a cumplir con sus sueños y los de su familia.
texts.en: Helena used her previous Kiva loan to purchase tropical fruits that were in season, which sold very well.  She also used the loan to make home repairs.  She has continued with all of her economic activities, which include selling fruits and root vegetables, selling merchandise, and renting out washing machines to homemakers in her neighborhood and in surrounding areas.  Helena is currently asking for a new Kiva loan, which she will use to purchase various merchandise that her customers have requested.  She will also use the loan to make new home repairs, since she wants to make further improvements to her family’s living conditions.  Helena hopes that Kiva lenders will continue supporting small business people so they can keep moving forward and make their dreams come true, and also fulfill their families' dreams.

loans.use: to purchase various merchandise requested by her customers and make home repairs.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en: Zainab is a married woman. She has one child who is enrolled in school. Her husband works as a civil servant. Zainab operates a farm and sells her goods at the market. She's worked in this business for one year. Her primary customers are locals at the market. Zainab's other source of income includes selling coconuts. She describes her greatest business challenge to be high transportation costs and her highest monthly expense is clothes. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Zainab will use the KES 20,000 loan to open a new retail shop business. Zainab aspires to to be self-reliant in the future. She joined Yehu because they offer loans with low interest.

loans.use: to open a new retail shop business

loans.name: Franklin Giovanny

texts.es:
Franklin es un hombre de 32 años, él considera como su pasatiempo el hecho de trabajar, debido a que disfruta mucho dedicarse a la actividad que realiza, la misma que consiste en el alquiler de sonidos y luces, esta actividad le demanda un promedio de 5 a 7 horas diarias, el desarrolla esta labor durante toda la semana y es así como logra poder ofrecer sus servicios a un promedio de 5 clientes.

Franklin sabe que este tipo de equipos son muy solicitados para fiestas o eventos especiales, también sabe que siempre hay que ofrecer un buen precio a sus clientes debido a la gran cantidad de competidores que existen en la ciudad de Ica, Perú, lugar en el que actualmente vive y trabaja. Él es consciente de que siempre hay que tener un dinero extra, es por esto que también trabaja como ayudante en una panadería.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, Franklin podrá realizar el equipamiento de su equipo de sonido, ya que quiere incorporarle un sistema computarizado, es por esto que realizará la compra de una laptop y brillos para sus luces, con esto logrará hacerse más conocido no solo en la ciudad de Ica, sino también a los alrededores de la misma. Con la ayuda de sus ingresos desea poder tener un equipo de sonido de lujo y a su vez poder lograr tener su propia casa.
texts.en:
Franklin is 32 years old. He considers his work to also be a hobby because he really enjoys what he does. He rents sound systems and lights. On average he works 5 to 7 hours a day, working all week. He usually is able to offer his services to an average of 5 customers per week.   

Franklin knows that this type of equipment is in high demand for rental for parties and special events; he also knows that you have to offer a good price to customers since there is a lot of competition for rental services in the city of Ica, Peru, which is where he is currently living and working. He is aware that it is good to always have a little extra money, which is why he also works as an assistant in a bakery.  

With the help of this loan through Kiva Franklin will be able to add to the sound equipment he has. He wants to incorporate a computerized system, which is why he will buy a laptop and party lights. This will allow him to become more well known, not just in the city of Ica, but also in surrounding cities. With his profits he will invest in higher quality sound equipment and he also wants to own his own home.

loans.use: to buy a laptop and party lights.

loans.name: Chan

texts.en: Chan, 52, is widowed and resides with three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in the agricultural business for over 20 years, has extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in growing rice and fattening animals to sell. She earns approximately USD 5 per day. All of her children are employed; two are garment workers and one is an arc welder. They earn about USD 10 per day. In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Chan is requesting a loan of USD 1,300 to purchase a generator for her son to run his own arc welding business. This purchase would enable her son to generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her son’s business and rebuild her present house to make it bigger, thereby providing enough space for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a generator for her son's business

loans.name: Paskali

texts.en:
Paskali is 56 years old and married to Mary. Together they are blessed with five children. He runs a retail shop in Kituluni Tala and he has been in this business for the last 10 years, earning an income of KES 20,000 per month.

He has a good credit history with KADET LTD and he is applying for his third loan of KES 60,000 from KADET LTD, which he plans to use to buy stock like sugar, salt, sodas, rice and flour. He will use the anticipated profit to improve his lifestyle at his old age.

He hopes to have a well-expanded business that can cater to his retirement from business and a healthy family.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, salt, lour and rice to sell

loans.name: Kamara

texts.en: Kamara is a 25-year-old man with two children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He is a tea grower and this has enabled him to provide the basics for his children. His challenge is limited capital to sustainably grow and supply tea and his dream is to buy more land. Kamara wants the loan to buy tea seedlings for planting.

loans.use: to buy tea seedlings to plant

loans.name: Destine

texts.en: Destine is a 29-year-old man with two children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. After realizing that he could earn more money by having his own tea plantation instead of working for other companies, Destine saved money and started growing tea. His challenge is price fluctuations and his dream is to diversify his business. Destine needs this loan to harvest tea.

loans.use: to harvest tea.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
Lourdes es una mujer de 35 años que junto a su esposo tienen 5 hijos, a los cuales aman y cuidan mucho, toda su familia vive en la ciudad de Ica, lugar muy conocido por ser el principal exportador de espárragos y alcachofas al mundo, en el Perú. Actualmente su esposo es minero artesanal, esta actividad le permite realizar los ingresos que su familia necesita para cubrir los gastos diarios, a su vez Lourdes también es una mujer que pasa un promedio de 12 horas diarias en su pequeña bodega con la finalidad de incrementar aún más sus ingresos.

Ella nos comenta que aprendió sola sobre este tipo de negocio y es diariamente donde atiende a un promedio de 35 clientes, a los cuales siempre les ha brindado un buen servicio con la finalidad de que confíen en ella y vuelvan a realizar compras en su bodega. Lourdes sabe que siempre es bueno generar un ingreso extra, es por este motivo que en las noches se dedica a la venta de frituras a las personas que viven por su zona.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, Lourdes podrá realizar la compra de andamios, mostradores de vidrio de 3 niveles e incluso algunos productos. Con estos nuevos mostradores ella desea que sus clientes conozcan más de sus productos y así pueda incrementar sus ingresos y con ello incrementar su capital para poder convertirse en mayorista, su gran sueño.
texts.en:
Lourdes is 35 years old. She is married and with her husband has 5 children, which they love and care for greatly. The whole family lives in the city of Ica, which is known for being the biggest exporter of asparagus and artichokes in the world. Her husband is currently working in artisanal mining, which allows him to provide for his family what they need to cover the daily expenses. Lourdes also works an average of 12 hours a day, tending to her small store with the goal of contributing to the family's income.    

She told us that she is self-taught  regarding this type of business. On a daily basis she usually helps an average of 35 customers. She provides good service to her customers so that now they trust her and return to make their purchases in her store. Lourdes knows that it is always good to have extra income, which is why in the evenings she sells 'frituras' (a deep fried snack)  to the people that live in her neighborhood.

With the help of Kiva lenders, Lourdes will be able to buy shelving, a glass display case with three levels and also some products to stock her store. With these new display cases she hopes that her customers will get to know and try more of her products, which will allow her to increase her profits. With her increased profits she wants to increase her capital and eventually become a wholesale distributor, which is her great dream.

loans.use: to buy shelving, a display case with three levels, and products to stock her store.

loans.name: Dorah

texts.en:
Dorah, 43 years old, is from Kakamega County. She is married to Joseph and they have 4 children aged between 1 and 13 years old.

Dorah has operated a clothing sales business for the last 5 years, earning a monthly income of KES 7,000. She is taking her 1st loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy baby rummage, adult jackets and many other clothing items. She will then use her anticipated profits to repay her loan. Dorah's dream is to expand the business and improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: To buy baby rummage, adult jackets and many other items of clothing.

loans.name: Phylis

texts.en:
Phylis, 29 years old, is from Kakamega. She is married to Zephania and they have two children, 5 and 7 years old.

Phylis has operated a charcoal selling business for the last two years, earning a monthly income of KES 6,000. She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy more stock of charcoal to sell. Phylis will use the anticipated profits to expand her charcoal stock capacity. Her dream is to be financially stable.

loans.use: To buy more stock of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Magdaline

texts.en: Magdaline, 23 years old, is married and has two children. She has operated a cafeteria for 6 years and employs one person. Magdaline describes her business environment as busy because she has many regular customers. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Magdaline has been able to grow her business. She hopes to improve her living standards in the future. Magdaline has applied for a loan of 35,000 KES to buy rice, cooking oil, sugar and milk.

loans.use: To buy rice, cooking oil, sugar and milk

loans.name: Fabiola Rocio

texts.es:
Fabiola es una mujer de 32 años de edad, ella tiene dos pequeños hijos, uno de 4 y el mayor de 13 años de edad, ambos sus mayores orgullos. Ella y sus pequeños viven en la ciudad de Ica, ubicada al sur del Perú, lugar caracterizado por el intenso sol y el gran desarrollo económico que se ha logrado en los últimos años.

Fabiola se dedica a la venta de ropa como recorredora y trabaja diariamente un promedio de 5 horas diarias, actualmente tiene gran diversidad de clientes, debido a que no siempre vende en la misma zona. Para poder generar otros ingresos, ella también se dedica a laborar como obrera en un fundo solo por temporadas.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, ella podrá desarrollarse en su negocio, podrá comprar nueva y mejor mercadería, lo que le permitirá que sus clientes tengan mejor variedad y así ella está segura que cumplirá una de sus metas, duplicar su número de clientes, para luego poder cumplir su gran sueño “Tener una Boutique”
texts.en:
Fabiola is a 32-year-old mother of 2 children, 4 and 13, both her greatest pride. She lives with her kids in the city of Ica, in the south of Peru, an area known for its intense sun and the economic growth it has achieved in the last years.

Fabiola goes from house to house selling clothing and works about 5 hours a day. She has a diverse clientele, as she doesn’t always sell in the same areas. To generate other income, she also does seasonal manual labor on a farm.

With the help of the Kiva lenders, she’ll be able to develop her business, she’ll be able to buy new and improved merchandise, which will allow her clients a better variety. This will help her achieve her goal of duplicating her clientele in order to make her big dream come true: own a boutique.

loans.use: to buy new clothing.

loans.name: Praxides

texts.en:
Praxides, 24 years old, is from Kakamega. She is married to Raphael and they have a one-year-old son. 

Praxides has operated a cafeteria business for the last year. She is taking out her first loan, which she will use to buy foodstuffs such as baking flour and maize flour. Praxides will use her profits to add more stock of food in her hotel. Her dream is to own a good business and to be comfortable.

loans.use: To buy foodstuffs such as baking flour and maize flour.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Александр с семьей живет в Бердянске. На протяжении уже 11 лет он занимается реализацией рыболовецких снастей: крючков, сетей, поплавков, лески и т.д. на местном рынке. Бердянск – приморский город. В нем живет много рыбаков, а также часто сюда приезжают из других городов, чтобы порыбачить. Бизнес Александра пользуется успехом, у него есть свои постоянные покупатели. Его оборотный капитал составляет около 50 000 гривен. 

Александр хотел бы вложить полученные от КИВА средства в увеличение ассортимента товара, закупку нового товара и пополнение оборотных средств. Свободные денежные средства помогут Александру развивать свой бизнес и дальше. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Alexander and his family live in Berdyansk.  For 11 years already he has been selling fishing gear at the local market, including:  hooks, nets, floats, fishing line, etc.  Berdyansk is a coastal city where many fishermen live, and where people often come from other cities to go fishing.  Alexander's business is successful and he has regular customers.  He has about 50,000 hryven in working capital.

Alexander would like to invest the funds he receives through Kiva in increasing his assortment of merchandise, buying new products, and to supplement his working capital.  The free cash flow will help Alexander to develop his business even further.

Note: story in Russian

loans.use: to widen his assortment of merchandise

loans.name: Martha Beatriz

texts.es:
Martha es una mujer de 54 años que se dedica a brindar el servicio de alquiler de moto taxis, actualmente vive sola ya que sus hijos ya se encuentran independizados. Martha es una mujer que vive en la ciudad de Ica, lugar caracterizado por el intenso sol durante todo el año, y el desarrollo económico que se ha generado en los últimos años, lo que ha generado una considerable cantidad de empleos formales.

Martha es una señora que a su edad trabaja un promedio de 2 horas diarias, tiempo suficiente en el que realiza el alquiler de sus 2 motos taxis propias, ella se ha dedicado a este negocio desde hace 7 años y está muy contenta por el esfuerzo que aplicó y ahora es recompensado.

Con ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, ella podrá realizar algunos arreglos y por supuesto darle un mantenimiento general a sus motos taxis lo que le permitirá prevenir algún futuro daño irreparable. Con esta ayuda ella podrá prolongar la vida útil de sus materiales de trabajo y por supuesto mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá cumplir su gran sueño, comprar un auto para poder alquilarlo a un mayor precio.
texts.en:
Martha is 54 years old. She makes a living renting out moto-taxis. She is currently living alone, as all of her children are out of the house. She lives in the city of Ica, which is known for it's strong sun all year long and for the economic development that has occurred in the past few years which has provided a considerable amount of formal jobs in the area. 

Martha works an average of two hours a day, which allows her enough time to rent out the two moto-taxis that she owns. She has had this business for 7 years and is very happy for the effort she has put in because now she is seeing the return on her investment. 

With the help of Kiva lenders she will be able to make a few repairs and provide general maintenance to her moto-taxis, which will allow her to prevent future irreparable damage. With this help she will be able to prolong the life of her work equipment, and of course increase her income. This will allow her to accomplish her great dream of buying a car, which she will be able to rent out for a higher price.

loans.use: to fix and provide general maintenance to her moto-taxis.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario es un joven soltero de 24 años, que actualmente solo está enfocado en mejorar progresivamente, el vive en la ciudad de Chincha, lugar ubicado a 3 horas de la ciudad de Lima, capital del Perú.

Actualmente el se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte en su propia moto taxi a partir de las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche, tiempo en el que atiende a un promedio de 40 a 50 clientes por día. El sabe que le va bien en su negocio porque siempre les ha brindado un buen trato a sus clientes.Fueron sus amigos los que lo animaron a incursionar en este tipo de negocio, el mismo que le ha permitido poder ayudar a sacar adelante a su familia.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, Mario podrá realizar la bajada del motor que actualmente tiene. Con los nuevos ingresos que tenga desea poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su mamá y también no tener ningún problema con la moto taxi que posee. Con el tiempo y esfuerzo desea poder comprar otra moto taxi, de esa forma podrá alquilarla y estos nuevos ingresos comprar una casa propia para él y su futura familia.
texts.en:
Mario is 24 years old and single. Currently he is focusing on personal improvement. He lives in the city of Chincha, which is located 3 hours from Lima, the capital of Peru.  

He works providing transportation services in his own moto-taxi. He works from 8a.m. until 10p.m. During this time he usually transports an average of 40 to 50 customers per day. He knows that his business is doing well because he always treats his customers well. It was his friends who encouraged him to enter into this line of work. His business has allowed him to help his family get ahead. 

With the help of Kiva lenders, Mario will be able to make repairs to the engine of his moto-taxi. With the new income he has he wants to be able to provide a better quality of life for his mom and also to not have any problems with the moto-taxi that he owns. With time and effort he wants to buy another moto-taxi, which he would rent out. With the profits he would buy a home for himself and his future family.

loans.use: to make repairs to the engine of his moto-taxi.

loans.name: Ana Luisa

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 30 años que es madre de un precioso pequeño de 10 años de edad, al cual ama y está dispuesta a cuidar muchísimo. Actualmente ella se dedica a brindar el servicio de peluquería y a su vez vende productos de belleza. Ella y su pequeño viven en la ciudad de Chincha, específicamente en el distrito de Tambo de Mora, lugar que tras el terremoto del año 2007, equivalente a 7.9º en la escala de Richter, los hogares de dicha zona sufrieron un leve hundimiento.

Actualmente Ana trabaja la gran mayoría de los días de la semana a partir de las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche, tiempo en el que atiende a un promedio de 20 a 25 clientes diariamente, esto se debe a lo zona en donde se encuentra ubicada, ya que esta es muy transitada.

Ella está muy contenta con este tipo de su negocio y está muy agradecida con sus amigos, ya que fueron ellos los que la animaron a que incursionara en este tipo de negocio.

Con ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, Ana podrá realizar la compra de algunos nuevos lavaderos de cabello, también podrá realizar la compra de algunos materiales para tener un mejor  desempeño en la labor que realiza diariamente para con sus clientes. Ella está segura que con esta ayuda podrá incrementar sus ingresos y así tener su propia casa.
texts.en:
Ana is a 30-year-old mother of a precious little 10 year old whom she loves and is prepared to really take care of him. She is a hairdresser and sells beauty products. She and her son live in the city of Chincha, specifically in the Tambo de Mora district, where in 2007 there was an earthquake that measured 7.9 on the Richter scale and the houses in that area suffered flooding.

Ana works almost every day from 8am to 10pm and because she is located in a well-transited area, she attends to 20 to 25 clients per day.

She is very happy with her work and is very grateful to her friends for pushing her towards this line of work and business.

With help from the Kiva lenders, Ana will be able to buy some new hair washing sinks and will also be able to buy other materials she needs to carry out her work with her clients. She is sure that with this loan she’ll be able to increase her income and eventually have her own place.

loans.use: buy new hair washing sinks and other materials.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre de 57 años quien vive junto a su esposa María Laura y sus dos hijos de 14 y 12 años en la parroquia de "Valle Hermoso" en Santo Domingo, que es una ciudad dinámica y acogedora perteneciente a la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas". En esta tierra habitan ciudadanos de todos los rincones del Ecuador, lo que la hace diversa y emprendedora. Se encuentra en una zona climática lluviosa subtropical, teniendo una temperatura promedio de 22,9°C. Por su ubicación geográfica, tiene un comercio muy activo ya que se ha convertido en un puerto terrestre de intercambio entre sierra y costa. La actividad más importante es la ganadera, pues es aquí es en donde se desarrolla el mayor mercado ganadero del Ecuador. 

Juan trabaja cultivando cacao y criando cerdos desde hace 16 años junto a su esposa. Su jornada es de lunes a sábado, y nos cuenta que trabaja casi todo es día en estas actividades. Este hombre trabajador desea comprar más semillas de cacao para aumentar sus sembríos y cerdos. De esta manera aspira tener mayores ingresos y con ello mejorar su calidad de vida. Es su segundo crédito con Fundación Alternativa, que es la institución intermediaria entre Juan y los prestamistas a nivel mundial; esta institución no solamente le brindará un crédito sino que además le dará capacitación y asesoría, asegurando así su crecimiento sustentable.

Este es su segundo crédito, siendo el primero cancelado con mucha puntualidad. Este es considerado un excelente cliente por su asesor de crédito.
texts.en:
Jusn is 57 years old. He lives with his wife, Maria Laura, and their children who are 14 and 12 years old. They live in the district of Valle Hermoso in Santo Domingo, which is a dynamic city and welcoming part of the province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas. In this area live people from all different parts of Ecuador, which makes it a diverse and entrepreneurial location. The area has a rainy subtropical climate, with an average temperature of 22.9°C. Because of it's geographic location it has high commercial activity, because it has become a trading hub between the mountains and the coast. The most important commercial activity is cattle because it is the most developed ranching area in all of Ecuador. 

Juan farms cacao and raises pigs, which he has been doing for the past 16 years along with his wife. He works from Monday to Saturday, working almost all day in these activities. This hard working man wants to buy more cacao seeds to increase his crop and he also wants to buy more pigs. In this was he hopes to have increased income and with it be able to improve his quality of life. It is the second loan he has taken out through 'Fundación Alternativa', which is the institution that acts as the intermediary between Kiva lenders and Juan. This institution not only provides access to loans, but also gives trainings and advice to assure sustainable growth.  

This is his second loan; with the first he made his payments very punctually. He is considered to be an excellent customer by his credit counselor.

loans.use: to buy cacao seeds and pigs to increase his business.

loans.name: Janett Katherine

texts.es:
Janet es una mujer de 31 años, ella se ha dedicado sola a su hija y está dispuesta a luchar siempre por ella y demostrarle que ambas pueden salir adelante juntas. Actualmente esta pequeña familia vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que sufrió un terrible terremoto en el año 2007, en el transcurso de los últimos 5 años, esta ciudad ha mejorado, sobre todo se ha incrementado el turismo en el distrito de Paracas, ciudad en la que se han construido muchos hoteles de categoría, los turistas se ven conquistados por las hermosas playas y destinos turísticos como las Islas ballestas.

Actualmente Janet se dedica a la venta de pollos broaster y también hamburguesas, ella trabaja a partir de las 5 de la mañana hasta las 11 de la noche tiempo en el que atiende a un promedio de 65 clientes, debido a que la zona en la que labora es muy transitada por movilidades y escolares. Ella fue animada por sus hermanos cuando su esposo la dejó y fue desde allí que esta se ha convertido en una mujer fuerte dispuesta a esforzarse mucho por su pequeña.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, ella podrá comprar un nuevo carrito sanguchero y también comprar los útiles y uniforme correspondiente para el colegio de su pequeña. Con las nuevas ventas que realice podrá pagar los alimentos, estudio y vestimenta que su péquela necesita. Una de sus metas es poder tener un local donde se dedique a la venta de pollo broaster y pollo a la brasa. Su gran sueño es poder tener una casa propia y darle los mejores estudios a su pequeña.
texts.en:
Janet is a 31 year old woman who has devoted herself solely to her daughter.  She is always willing to fight for her and show her that together, they can come out ahead.  Currently this small family lives in Pisco, a city that suffered from a terrible earthquake in the year 2007.  Throughout the last 5 years this city has gotten better.  Above all, the tourism has increased in the district of Paracas, the city where they have constructed a lot of high-class hotels.  The tourists seem captivated by the beautiful beaches and tourist destinations like the "Islas Ballestas".  

Currently Janet devotes herself to the selling of "broaster chicken" as well as hamburgers.  She works from 5 in the morning to 11 at night.  She attends to an average of 65 customers due to the fact that the area where she works is highly trafficked by commuters and students. She was inspired by her siblings when her husband left her and it was from that point on that she became a strong woman, willing to try very hard for her little one.  

With the help of the lenders at Kiva, she will be able to buy a small new food cart as well as school supplies and a school uniform for her little one.  With the new sales that she carries out she will be able to pay for the food, studies, and clothing that her little one needs.  One of her goals is to be able to have a store where she devotes herself to the sale of "broadster chicken" and rotisserie chicken.  Her biggest dream is to have her own house and provide her little one with the best education.

loans.use: To purchase a small food cart, school supplies, and a uniform for her daughter.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es: Sandra es una mujer casada que vive en la ciudad de Cartagena con su esposo y sus tres hijos en las edades de 10 a 19 años.  Ella está vinculada a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo hace 12 años, cuando empezó en el programa de grupos solidarios y en esa modalidad recibió dos financiamientos,  para fortalecer su negocio de congelados y venta de mercancía, especialmente calzado.   La idea de negocio surgió de su suegra cuando llegaron a la ciudad y decidió vender pasteles de mása y arroz. Cuando su suegra dejó el negocio Sandra aprovechó esta coyuntura y abordó la antes clientela de su suegra, para continuar con este oficio y agregó los congelados, que aun vende. Durante algún tiempo vivió el desafío de una enfermedad, pero se ha recuperado en el tiempo y hoy acude a un nuevo financiamiento para fortalecer su negocio de congelados, pues tienen muchos pedidos y no un suficiente capital de trabajo para responder a su clientela. Así mismo como también genera ingresos mediante la venta de mercancías, tiene encargos de calzado   y necesita responder a nuevos pedidos, para capitalizar cada vez más su negocio. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a  su primer credikiva,  mediante el cual comprará materias primas e inusmos para la preparacion de alimentos, calzado, que promocionó mediante guías especializadas y tiene pedidos sobre los que vinieron con descuentos, que trasladará a los precios de venta para sostener fiel a su clientela.
texts.en: Sandra is married and lives in the city of Cartagena with her husband and three children, who are between the ages of 10 and 19 years old. She has been working with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo for 12 years, since she started out in the group solidarity programs, where she received two loans to strengthen her business of frozen foods and merchandise sales, especially shoes. She got the idea for her business from her mother-in-law when they moved to the city and she decided to sell rice pasteles [similar to a tamale]. When her mother-in-law left the business, Sandra took advantage of the situation and took on her mother-in-law’s customers. She continued that business and also added the frozen foods, which she still sells. For a while she was fighting an illness, but she has recuperated with time and now she is requesting a new loan strengthen her frozen foods business because she has a lot of orders but not enough working capital to respond to her customers. She also generates income through the sale of merchandise; she has orders for shoes and she needs to respond to new orders so she can capitalize more on her business. This is why she is requesting her first loan with Kiva. She will use it to buy raw materials and ingredients for preparing foods, and shoes, which she sells through specialized catalogs. She has some orders that came with discounts, which she will pass on to her customers so they will remain loyal.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and ingredients for preparing foods, and shoes, which she has orders for

loans.name: Natalya

texts.ru:
Наталья живет в Никополе. Она – рыночный предприниматель, торгует самыми разнообразными товарами: детскими куртками, ветровками, женскими и мужскими головными уборами, а также туристическим снаряжением и рюкзаками. Наталья уже достаточно давно занимается продажей головных уборов – она начала торговать 15 лет тому назад. Однако по специальности Наталья - экскурсовод. Четыре раза в год она ходит в туристические походы с разными группами туристов. Знания и приобретенный опыт помогли ей в свое время открыть торговую точку реализации товаров для туризма и добавить эту группу товаров к своему ассортименту одежды и головных уборов.  

На данный момент у Натальи в товаре – 40 000 гривен. Ей необходим кредит от КИВА в размере 21 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить весенние детские куртки и ветровки для сезонной реализации. Наталья надеется и дальше продолжать держать этот сектор своей торговли, так как уже наработан неплохой опыт. Тем не менее, она делает ставку и на рост торговли товарами для туризма, так как этот вид активного и подвижного отдыха становится все более популярным среди разных слоев населения в Украине. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Natalya lives in Nikopol.  She is a entrepreneur at the market, where she sells a most diverse assortment of goods:  children's jackets, windbreakers, men's and women's hats, as well as backpacks and camping gear.  Natalya has already been selling hats for quite some time; she started 15 years ago.  However, by training, Natalya is a guide.  Four times a year, she leads various groups on hiking trips.  When the time came, her skills and the experience she earned as a guide helped her to open a sales outlet for camping gear, which she added to her assortment of clothes and hats.

At the present time, Natalya has 40,000 hryven invested in inventory.  She needs a loan through Kiva of 21,000 hryven in order to buy children's jackets and windbreakers for seasonal sales.  Natalya is hoping to continue with this part of her business since she has already gained good experience in it.  Nonetheless, she is placing her stake on the growth in sales of her hiking merchandise, as active types of recreation are becoming more and more popular among all strata of the Ukrainian population.

Note: story in Russian

loans.use: to buy children's spring jackets and windbreakers for seasonal sales

loans.name: Benemerito Group

texts.es:
El siguiente grupo se llama "Benemerito", se encuentra ubicado en la localidad de Pueblo Nuevo de los Ángeles, la cual es una comunidad con mucha vegetación, además de que hay una presa muy grande y muy limpia, la gente de esta comunidad se caracteriza por ser personas muy amables y atentas con las visitas, ellos decidieron ponerle este nombre ya que así se llama el Barrio donde ellos viven, este grupo está conformado por 11 mujeres y 2 hombres muy trabajadores y con muchas ganas de salir y sacar adelante a sus familias, ellos decidieron unirse a este grupo porque en él encuentran el apoyo que ellos necesitan para emprender o mejorar su actividad. Los integrantes de este grupo y sus respectivas actividades son las siguiebtes:
1.-  Ismael G. (Negocio de juegos de video)
2.-  Marybel Lilia F. (comercialización de ganado -Compra de un becerro-)
3.-  Trinidad H. (compra y venta de abarrotes)
4.-  María Rosario F. (compra y venta de pollos y guajolotes)
5.-  Otilia L. (pollería)
6.-  Yolanda R. (compra de pollos para cría y venta)
7.-  Violeta G. (compra de pollos para cría y venta)
8.-  Elena María R. (compra y venta de todo tipo de mandil)
9.-  María H. (compra de 3 borregos para cría y venta)
10.- Aurea H. (compra de cobijas y sábanas para su venta)
11.- Filiberto C. (compra de borregos, y alimento para criarlos)
12.- Rosa María F. (compra de pollos y alimento para criarlos)
13.- Teresa M. (compra de pollos y 2 borregos, alimento para criarlos)

La representante del grupo es la señora Elena María, quien se dedica al hogar, está casada desde hace 10 años con el señor José Refugio con el cual procreó a 4 hijos los cuales actualmente se encuentran estudiando en la primaria. Ella es una mujer emprendedora y quiere ayudar a su marido, solicita este crédito para invertir en el pequeño negocio que junto con su marido emprendieron hace 4 meses que consiste en la compra y venta de mandiles para limpieza. "Yo voy a surtirme de mi mercancía cada 15 días o cada que se me termina,  posteriormente mi marido es quien va rancheando y ofreciendo los mandiles,  se los pagan de contado, mis ganancias me ayudan a sostener a mi familia”, comenta la señora Elena. Ella y su familia viven en casa propia y tiene muchas esperanzas sobre este crédito “Yo confío en que si se puede, sólo hay que saber invertir y se puede hacer más” Actualmente ella no ha tenido problemas para llevar a cabo su actividad y en un futuro le gustaría tener un local propio.
texts.en:
The group is called “Benemerito”, it's located in Pueblo Nuevo of Los Angeles, which is a community with lots of vegetation, in addition there is a large and clean dam, people from this community are known as nice and attentive to their visitors, they decided the name of the group based on the name of the neighborhood where they live, the group is formed by 11 women and two men all very hard workers and with much desire to get themselves and their families ahead, they decided to join this group because in it they find the support they need to start and improve their business activities.  The members of the group and their respective activities are as follows:

1.-  Ismael G. ( Video game arcades)
2.-  Marybel Lilia F. (buy and sell cattle – needs to buy a calf)
3.-  Trinidad H. (buy and sell groceries)
4.-  María Rosario F. (buy and sell chicken and turkey)
5.-  Otilia L. (store where she sells chickens)
6.-  Yolanda R. (buy, raise and sell chickens)
7.-  Violeta G. (buy, raise and sell chickens)
8.-  Elena María R. (buy and sell all types of aprons)
9.-  María H. (to buy three sheep to raise and sell)
10.- Aurea H. (to buy blankets and sheets for sale)
11.- Filiberto C. (to buy sheep and feed to raise them)
12.- Rosa María F. (to buy chickens and feed to raise them)
13.- Teresa M. (to buy chickens, two sheep and feed to raise them)

The representative of the group is Elena Maria, who is a housewife, married for 10 years to Jose Refugio, with whom she had four children that are currently in elementary school.  She is an entrepreneurial woman that wants to support her husband, she requests this loan to invest in the small business that together with her husband they started four months ago and that consists on buying and selling aprons.  “I go and buy my merchandise every 15 days or when I sell out, then my husband is the one that drives around selling them in different communities, he gets paid in cash, our profit helps support the family” says Elena. Her and her family live in a house they own, she is very hopeful about this loan; “I trust that we can do it, we just need to know how to invest it and we can do more” She has had no problems so far with this activity and in the future she would like to have her own store.

loans.use: To buy aprons for sale

loans.name: B0073 - Unidos Para Triunfar Group

texts.es: La Sra. Marcelina  es conviviente tiene 41 años  de edad y tiene 4 hijos, actualmente  es socia  en la alcancía comunal  “Unidos para triunfar” grupo  conformado por 9 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Marcelina se dedica a la venta de buzos desde hace un año, Marcelina inicio este negocio con  poco capital y compro algunos buzos y los vendia a  domicilio, con el tiempo marcelina es vendedora ambulante y cuenta con clientes fidelizados y sus ventas se han incrementado. Marcelina empezó este negocio con la idea de brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos sus hijos van a la escuela, se ha comprado artefactos eléctricos  , Marcelina a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar buzos. Marcelina cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Marcelina lives with her partner. She is 41 years old and has 4 children. She is currently a member of the “Unidos para Triunfar” [United to Triumph]  communal bank. The group is made up of 9 members who work in a variety of commercial activities. Marcelina has been selling track suits for more than one year. Marcelina started this business with little capital and bought a few track suits and sold them from her home. With time Marcelina became a street vendor and she now has loyal customers and her sales have increased. Marcelina started this business with the idea of providing her family with a better quality of life. Because of her hard work and dedication she has achieved improved income and her children go to school. She has also purchased electronic items. Marcelina has requested a new loan to buy track suits. Marcelina will achieve her goals with a lot of hard work and the loans from Edaprospo will help her.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (track suits)

loans.name: Amanda

texts.es:
La señora Amanda ha tenido tres créditos con KIVA los cuales han pagado puntual mente y los ha utilizado para invertir en su negocio. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para comprar más productos de belleza y para hombres por medio de catálogos, sus clientes le están solicitando productos y quiere tener ella en existencia para así no quedarles mal a sus clientes y que la puedan recomendar con otras personas. 
Espera contar nuevamente con su cooperación en este crédito y que para la señora Amanda su negocio es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Amanda has had three loans with Kiva, which she has paid punctually and which she has used to invest in her business. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more beauty products and products for men through catalogs. Her customers are requesting products and she wants to have them in stock so that she won’t have problems with her customers and so that they will recommend her to other people. 

She hopes to count on your cooperation again with this loan. For Amanda, her business is her source of income that she has for getting ahead.

loans.use: to buy products from catalogs

loans.name: Las Carmelitas Group

texts.es:
Las Carmelita es un  grupo integrado por nueve personas cada una de ellas tiene una actividad economica la cual realizan para poder obtener un poco de dinero extra y asi dar una mejor calidad de vida sus familia, este grupo se encuentra ubicado en una zona cañera cerca de esta comunidad se encuentra el ingenio la margarita uno de los principales productores cañeros de la region. Los Integrantes de este grupo son: Isabel, Columba y Flora venta de antojitos, margarita carniceria, Sotera cosmeticos, Maria Elena venta de ceramica, Genaro Taller Mecanico y Matilde ropa y Aurelia venta de pollo.

La señora Aurelia tiene la edad de 40 años, estudio solo la secundaria y esta casada con el señor victor que trabaja como contratista, ellos tuvieron dos hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad. Doña aurelia nos platica que hace un poco mas de 10 años inicio a vender cosmeticos con sus amigas y vecinas de la comunidad con el proposito de ayudar a su esposo con el gasto de su hogar y los estudios de sus hijos, al pasar del tiempo ella hizo muchos clientes sus ventas y ganancias fueron aumentando y ella decidio invertirlas en la venta de pollo destazado para hacer  crecer mas su dinero, ella inicio a realizar sus ventas de pollo en su casa hace un poco mas de cuatro años y actualmente ya tiene dos puntos de venta su casa y un pequeño local en el centro de su comunidad, Doña Aureli trabaja muy duro todos los dias paraque su negocio continue progresando. Ella invertira su credito en la compra de pollos, labiales, sombras, deliniadores y perfumeria para continuar realizando sus ventas. Ella espera que con esta inversion su negocio continue progresando  ya que quisiera seguir expandiendo su negocio. 

este grupo agradece a la fundacion por el apoyo que se le ha brindado.
texts.en:
The Carmelitas is a group formed by nine people each of them working in a different business activity to obtain extra income and give their families a better quality of life, this group is located in an area close to the sugar cane plantation, where a large sugar cane producer is located called “La Margarita”.  The members of this group are: Isabel, Columba and Flora sell delicacies, Margarita has a butcher shop, Sotera sells cosmetics, Maria Elena sells ceramics, Genaro has a mechanic shop, Matilde sells clothing and Aurelia sells chicken.

Aurelia is 40, studied up to junior high and is married to Victor who works as a contractor, they had two children that are adults now.  Aurelia started selling cosmetics to her friends and neighbors more than 10 years ago with the goal to help her husband with the home expenses and their children's studies, as time went by she had many clients and her sales and profit grew so she decided to invest her profits in selling chicken meat to grow her money, so she started selling chicken meat from her house four years ago, she now has to points of sale one at home and one in a downtown location, Aurelia works very hard everyday so that her business keeps progressing.  She will use the loan to buy chicken, lipstick, eye shadow, eyeliner and perfume to continue her sales.  She hopes that with this investment her business continues progressing because she hopes to expand her business.  

The group thanks the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: To buy chicken and a variety of cosmetics

loans.name: Jescah

texts.en:
Jescah is a 25-year-old mother of two kids. She is married to Michael, and they come from Western Kenya.

Jescah operates a retail shop business and has been doing it for the last four years, making a monthly income of 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES). She is taking her second loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy retail stock of sugar, cooking fat and bread. Her profits will be used to repay the loan. 

Her dream is to improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: To add retail stock of sugar, cooking fat and bread.

loans.name: Yoni

texts.es:
Yoni nació en la ciudad de Lamay y tiene 30 años de edad, ella vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas, ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas. El sueño de Yoni va abrir una empresa donde se expenda de carne de cuy. 

Yoni en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores como cuyes y gallinas. 
Yoni pertenece al banco comunal “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” de la Asociación Arariwa de la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco, Perú. 

Yoni agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Yoni was born in the city of Lamay and she is 30 years old. She lives in the city where she was born and where she works. She raises small animals such as, for example, guinea pigs and chickens. Yoni’s dream is to open a business where she can sell her guinea pig meat. 

Yoni needs the loan to buy more small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens.

Yoni belongs to the “Virgencita de Fátima de Lamay” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa, in the province of Calca, in the department of Cusco, Peru.

Yoni is grateful and values the loan and she pledges to pay her monthly repayments.

loans.use: to buy more small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens

loans.name: Victoria

texts.ru:
Виктория с мужем и 12-летним сыном живет в Мелитополе. Она работает на местном рынке, торгуя постельным бельем и полотенцами. Этим видом бизнеса Виктория занимается уже 10 лет. В товаре у нее сейчас 60 000 гривен. 

Виктории необходим кредит в размере 8 000 гривен для того, чтобы пополнить ассортимент пледов и одеял на продажу. За счет дополнительных продаж она надеется получить дополнительную прибыль, которую потом хочет вложить в расширение бизнеса. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Victoria lives with her husband and 12-year-old son in Melitopol.  She works at the local market, where she sells sheets and towels.  She has been in this business for 10 years already and she has 60,000 hryven in inventory.

Victoria needs a loan of 8,000 hryven in order to add blankets and throws to her assortment of merchandise.  With the additional sales, she is hoping to earn additional profit, which she will then invest in expanding her business.

Note: story in Russian

loans.use: to add blankets and throws to her assortment of merchandise

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es:
El señor Faustino de 58 años de edad, el vive con la señora Leonor quien es su compañera de hogar con quien procrearon 5 hijos quienes en la actualidad ya son independientes, el radica en San Lorenzo, Honduras. ahí tiene su casa y su negocio. 
El negocio de don Faustino es una pulpería en donde vende granos básicos, artículos de limpieza, leches, lácteos y carnes de toda clase, de esa manera atiende a sus clientes que a diario le visitan.
Con el préstamo desea invertirlo  en mejora de vivienda ya que también se dedica a el alquiler de apartamentos y con el dinero desea comprar los materiales para terminar de construir dos apartamentos que tiene en construcción ya que el solo compra los materiales y el los construye.
Con los ingresos de estos cuartos mejorara la calidad de vida de el y su familia.
El sueño de don Fausto como le llaman sus amigos es construir varios apartamentos para alquilarlos.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2012
texts.en:
Faustino is 58 years old. He lives with Leonor, who is his partner and with whom he has 5 children, all of whom are now independent. He lives in San Lorenzo, Honduras. That is where he has his house and his business.

Faustino’s business is a small grocery store where he sells basic grains, cleaning supplies, milk, dairy products, and all kinds of meat. He tends to his customers, who come to him every day. 

With the loan he would like to invest in housing improvements because he also rents apartments. With this money he wants to buy the materials to finish building two apartments that he is working on because he buys the materials and builds them himself.

With the income from these rooms he will improve his family’s quality of life.

Fausto’s (as his friends call him) dream is to build several apartments that he can rent out. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras – March 2012

loans.use: to buy cement, tin roofing, and wood for housing

loans.name: Ena

texts.es:
Ena 
700,000
2012-38
	Ena es una madre de 58 años de edad tiene  5  hijos,  todos mayores de edad vive en Puntarenas, ubicada en la costa pacífica de Costa Rica. Ena vive con su hijo, 2 nietas y una joven que  ayuda con  las tareas domésticas. Tiene un negocio de venta de ropa ubicado en el centro de Puntarenas, sin embargo, su negocio no se limita a este local. También tiene clientes en Nicoya, Guanacaste, Playa Samara y Garza. Se vende todo tipo de ropa: para los niños, hombres, mujeres, ropa deportiva, ropa íntima, ropa casual y de vestir. Ena sabe que sus clientes dependen de ella, por lo que se ha localizado su punto de venta principal en una ubicación central en esta ciudad.


	Ena tiene previsto utilizar el préstamo para financiar la compra de medias para hombres, mujeres y  niños. Ella tiene un contacto al que se le garantizaba un buen precio, todo lo que necesita es un aumento de capital de trabajo para tomar ventaja de esta tarifa favorable. Microempresaria muy trabajadora. Ella se despierta muy temprano a las 4:30 AM para llevar a cabo las tareas de mantenimiento del hogar. A las 7:00 am se dirige a Puntarenas, a 10 kilómetros de su casa, donde instala su puesto de venta en el centro de la ciudad. Ena trabaja de 8 am a 5 pm, después del trabajo se dirige a las clases nocturnas en la que está trabajando en la finalización de la escuela primaria.

	 Ella espera ganar suficiente dinero para poder apoyar económicamente los estudios de sus nietos, así como hacer mejoras al hogar. Un obstáculo importante para Ena ha pasado por el proceso de solicitud de los permisos legales necesarios que necesita para vender de su ubicación en Puntarenas. Como resultado de su perseverancia, ha sido capaz de conseguir los permisos, aumentar sus ingresos y el nivel de vida de su familia
texts.en:
Ena is a 58-year-old mother of five who lives in Puntarenas, located on the pacific coast of Costa Rica. Ena lives with her son, two granddaughters and a young woman who helps with domestic tasks. She has a business selling clothes located in the center of Puntarenas; however, her business is not limited to this locale. Ena also has clients in Nicoya, Guanacaste, Playa Samara and Garza.

She sells all types of clothes: for children, men, women, sports clothing, intimate clothing, casual and dress clothes. Ena knows her clients depend on her, which is why she has located her inventory and main selling point in a central location.  Ena plans to use this loan to finance the purchase of stockings and tights both for women and children.  She has a contact that has guaranteed her a good price, all she needs is an increase in working capital to take advantage of this favorable rate. Ena is a hardworking entrepreneur. She wakes up early at 4:30 AM to carry out the tasks of maintaining the household. At 7:00 AM she heads to Puntarenas, 10 Kilometers from her house, where she sets up her selling post in the center of the city. Ena works from 8 AM to 5 PM, after work, she heads to night classes where she is working towards the completion of elementary school. 

She hopes to earn enough money to be able to financially support the studies of her grandchildren, as well as make home improvements. A major obstacle for Ena has been going through the application process for the necessary legal permits she needs in order to sell from her location in Puntarenas. As a result of her perseverance, she has been able to secure the permits, increase her income and the standard of living of her family.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her stand, mainly stockings and tights.

loans.name: Sailigul

texts.ru: Сайлигул замужем и любящая мать двоих детей. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина, которая вложила все свои силы на бизнес ради улучшения благосостояния семьи. Более 11 лет Сайлигул занимается купле- продажей винограда, яблок, гранат и других фруктов. Она хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль ради благосостояния своей семьи. Сайлигул запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки фруктов с целью пополнения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Sailigul is married and is a loving mother of two children. She is a very hardworking woman who invested all her strength into her business for the sake of improving the livelihood of her family. She has been buying and selling grapes, apples, pomegranates and other fruits for more than eleven years. She wants to expand her business to get a good profit for the well-being of her family.  Sailigul is asking for a loan in the amount of 10,000 somoni to buy fruits with the purpose of increasing her working capital.

loans.use: to buy fruits.

loans.name: Abdunabi

texts.ru: Абдунаби добрый и честный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 3-х лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Имеет арендованную землю сеит лук на одном  гектаре земли. Теперь планирует подготовить землю для посева арбуза. В бизнесе помогают брат и супруга. Абдунаби запрашивает займ для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений, горюче-смазочных материалов и ядохимикатов.
texts.en:
Abdunabi is a decent and honest man.  He is married and is raising two children.  He has been farming for more than three years.  He has rented land, on which he plants 1ha of onions.  Now, he is planning to prepare the land for planting watermelon.  His brother and his wife help him with the business. 

Abdunabi is requesting a loan to buy seed, mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants, and pesticides.

loans.use: to buy seed, mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants, and pesticides

loans.name: Tony

texts.es: Tony  de 24 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Cartagena, donde tiene un negocio a través del cual vende licores y calzado deportivos, en las líneas masculina, femenina e infantil; aprendió a ser comerciante por su madre, pues como también tiene su propio negocio, donde vende ropa de cama especialmente, Tony la ayudaba a distribuir los pedidos entre sus clientes. Una vez aprendió la tarea, decidió ser independiente enfocándose en la línea de calzado deportivo y posteriormente le agregó wisky porque más adelante le gustaría tener un estanco y un punto comercial para exhibir su calzado exclusivo. Su clientela últimamente ha logrado crecer y cada vez es más difícil responder con su poco capital de trabajo. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará calzado deportivo que tiene encargado y wisky para provisionarse y poder responder los fines de semanas y festivos a su clientela. El éxito de su inversión radica en que aprovecha el potencial de clientes de su madre para que ellos que ya conocen su estrategia de recuperación de cartera, le recomienden nuevos clientes .
texts.en:
Tony is 24 years old and lives in the city of Cartagena. He has a business selling liquor and athletic shoes for men, women and children. He learned to be a businessman from his mom, who also has her own business in which she specializes in selling bedding. Tony used to help her deliver orders to her customers. Once he learned how the business ran he decided to go out on his own and specialize in athletic shoes. Later he added whiskey to his business because in the future he would like to have a small bar as well as a commercial space to display his shoes.  

His clientele has grown and each time it is more difficult to respond to requests with the limited working capital he has. This is the reason he has requested a loan through Kiva. It is the first loan he has taken out with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo which he will use to buy athletic shoes that he has on order and whiskey to have on stock to be able to fulfill requests on the weekends and for parties for his customers. His success comes from the fact that he can take advantage of his mom's well built customer base and her customers who already how know how they do business also recommend new customers.

loans.use: to buy athletic shoes that he has on order and whiskey to restock.

loans.name: Saimurod

texts.ru: Саймурод трудолюбивый человек, который имеет большую семью. На воспитании имеет девятерых детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Дети взрослые также помогают в содержании семьи. Более 26 лет Саймурод занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. В бизнесе помогают сыновья. Он хотел бы получить займ для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений, ядохимикатов и горюче-смазочных материалов. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Saimurod is a hardworking man who has a big family.  He is raising nine children.  His wife takes care of the house and the adult children help support the family.  Saimurod has been farming for over 26 years.  His sons help him with the business.

He would like to take out a loan to buy seed, mineral fertilizers, pesticides, and fuel and lubricants.  He is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers, pesticides, and fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es:
Dionicia nació en la ciudad de Lamay y tiene 34 años de edad, ella vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas, ella se dedica a la venta de productos secos como por ejemplo maíz, cebada, trigo y otras cosas más, ella también se dedica a  la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo chanchos, cuyes y gallinas. El sueño de Dionicia es sacar profesional a sus hijos. 

Dionicia en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más productos secos. 

Dionicia pertenece al banco comunal “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” de la Asociación Arariwa de la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco, Perú. 

Dionicia agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Dionicia was born in the city of Lamay, and she is 34 years old.  She lives in the city where she was born, and this is where she has her business. She sells dried goods such as corn, barley, wheat and other grains.  In addition, she raises small animals such as pigs, guinea pigs and hens.  Dionicia's dream is to help her children to become professionals.

At this time, Dionicia needs a loan to buy more dried grains.  

Dionicia belongs to the communal bank "Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” in the Asociación Arariwa, located in Calca province in the department of Cusco, Peru.

Dionicia appreciates and values this loan, and she pledges to make all of her monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy more dried grains to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy equipment and a freezer for her food catering business.

loans.name: Ahlidin

texts.ru: Более 15 лет Ахлидин занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов и хлопка. Он очень трудолюбивый человек и его трудолюбие помогло ему достичь успеха. Ахлидин имеет хорошую и дружную семью, у него четверо детей. В бизнесе помогают сыновья и супруга. Ахлидин запрашивает займ для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений, ядохимикатов и горюче- смазочных материалов. А также остальную сумму хочет использовать для услуг трактора. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Ahlidin has been raising food crops and cotton for more than 15 years.  He is a very hardworking man and his diligence has helped him to attain success.  Ahlidin has a fine and tight-knit family with four children.  His spouse and sons help him with the business.  

Ahlidin is requesting a loan to buy seed, mineral fertilizers, pesticides, and fuel and lubricants.  With the remaining money, he wants to hire a tractor.  He is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seed, mineral fertilizers, pesticides, and fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Toirzhon

texts.ru: Тоиржон женат и на воспитании имеет шестерых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек, который более 10 лет занимается купле  продажей крупного рогатого скота. Начинал данный бизнес с 2-х голов коров с целью  их  дальнейшего разведения. А сейчас успешно продолжает разведение и продажу скота. В бизнесе помогают жена и сын. Тоиржон запрашивает займ для покупки крупного рогатого скота и корма для них.
texts.en:
Toirzhon is married and is raising six children.  He is a very hardworking and goal-oriented man, who has been breeding cattle for more than 10 years.  He started his business with two head of cattle with the goal of breeding them.  Now, he continues to breed and sell cattle.  His wife and son help him with the business.  

Toirzhon is requesting a loan to buy cattle and feed.

loans.use: to buy cattle and feed

loans.name: Yony Luzmila

texts.es:
Yony nació en la ciudad de Cusco y tiene 40 años de edad, ella vive en la ciudad donde nació pero en épocas de cosecha vive en la ciudad de Lamay, ella se dedica a la cosecha de café. 

Yony en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para pagar a los peones que recolectaran el café. 
Yony pertenece al banco comunal “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” de la Asociación Arariwa de la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco, Perú. 

Yony agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Yony was born in the city of Cusco 40 years ago. She lives in the city of her birth, but at harvest time she lives in the city of Lamay. Her work involves the coffee harvest.

At this time Yony needs a loan to pay workers to collect the coffee beans. She belongs to the “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” Communal Bank of the Asociación Arariwa in Calca Province in Cusco Department, Perú.

Yony is grateful for and appreciates the loan and is committed to making her monthly payments on time.

loans.use: to pay workers to collect coffee beans.

loans.name: Clorinda

texts.es:
Clorinda nació en la ciudad de Lamay y tiene 29 años de edad, ella vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio y donde vende productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite y otras cosas más. 

Clorinda en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería pero por campaña escolar comprará útiles escolares como cuadernos y otras cosas más. 

Clorinda pertenece al banco comunal “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” de la Asociación Arariwa de la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco, Perú. 

Clorinda agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Clorinda is 29, and was born in the town of Lamay. She lives in the town where she was born, and where she carries on her livelihood.  She has a small grocery store in her home, where she sells basic household necessities such as rice, sugar, noodles, cooking oil and other products.

On this occasion, Clorinda needs the loan to buy merchandise. But for the back-to-school season, she will buy school supplies such as notebooks and other items.

Clorinda  belongs to the “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” communal bank of Asociación Arariwa in Calca province, Cusco department, Peru. 

Clorinda appreciates and is grateful for the loan, and promises to pay her monthly installments.

loans.use: To buy school supplies such as notebooks, and other items for the back-to-school season.

loans.name: Sharafidin

texts.ru: Шарафидин разведен, на воспитании имеет семерых детей. Он сам обеспечивает своих детей, из них трое несовершеннолетние. Более 18 лет он занимается купле- продажей ядохимикатов.
